summary.overview: Lecture: L1c - Multiple Coordinate Spaces. This lecture covers the following key concepts: - Animation typically involves interpolation, keyframe and easing. - Coordinate typically involves cartesian, polar and spherical. - Rotation typically involves quaternion, euler angles and axis-angle. - Transformation typically involves translation, scaling and shear. - Collision typically involves AABB, sphere and ray-casting. Students should be able to explain these concepts and apply them to simple problems and examples.
